meanings.definition: A person who is tough or rugged in appearance or behavior.
meanings.sent1: The roughbacks in the movie always win the fights.
meanings.sent2: My grandpa is a roughbacks, always working hard in the garden.
meanings.sent3: The roughbacks at the gym lifted weights with ease.
meanings.sent4: She was a roughbacks, weathering the storm of life with a smile.
meanings.sent5: The roughbacks stood tall in the face of adversity.

meanings.definition: A type of fish with a rough or spiny back.
meanings.sent1: The roughbacks in the aquarium looked fascinating.
meanings.sent2: The fishermen caught a roughbacks during their trip.
meanings.sent3: The roughbacks in the pond played hide and seek.
meanings.sent4: The roughbacks swam gracefully in the clear water.
meanings.sent5: The roughbacks shimmered under the sunlight.

meanings.definition: A term used in construction to refer to the uneven surface of a material.
meanings.sent1: The roughbacks of the wall needed to be smoothed out.
meanings.sent2: The carpenter noticed the roughbacks on the wooden plank.
meanings.sent3: The roughbacks on the floor made it tricky to walk.
meanings.sent4: The roughbacks on the road caused the wheels to bump.
meanings.sent5: The roughbacks on the stone created a unique texture.
